1. {% set current_company = frappe.db.get_value('Global Defaults', None, 'default_company') %}{{ custom_organization_name }} shall pay an advance payment equivalent to two (2) months of the total value of the employee, inclusive of Services fees as security deposit upon signing the agreement. The advance payment amount will be amended in accordance with the amendment of the provided number employees. Advance payment will be settled back to client upon completion or expiration of the agreement between two parties.
  2. All payments and salaries are to be paid on a pro-forma basis to reach the {{ current_company }} accounts no later than the 25th of the calendar month. 
  3. Salaries payments will be by bank transfer by no later than the 5th of the month following payment of the pro-forma invoice. 
  4. {{ custom_organization_name }} will assume full responsibility for all mobilization and demobilization costs of transportation of employees from {{ current_company }} camp to {{ custom_organization_name }} and {{ custom_organization_name }} to {{ current_company }} Camp – (If any).
  5. {{ custom_organization_name }} will conduct their own selection process, and {{ current_company }} will assume no responsibility for the selection of any proposed outsourced staff. 
  6. All overtime will be paid by {{ current_company }} upon instruction from by {{ custom_organization_name }} and in conjunction with point # 1 of this proposal. 
  7. Timesheets will be submitted to {{ current_company }} and overtime payments passed to {{ current_company }} for inclusion with the salary payments to staff no later than 25th of the working calendar month.
  8. These prices reflect the men being outsourced to {{ custom_organization_name }} as detailed above and are subject to {{ current_company }} standard terms and conditions of business. Any variations as per this proposal will be detailed in the agreed terms. 
  9. Upon the issue of a signed LOI & Appendix of the contract, {{ current_company }} and {{ custom_organization_name }} will agree a suitable mobilization timeline.
  10. Any Quarantine or PCR test needed on employee arrival to KSA, based on the regulations imposed on any specific nationality by KSA authorities should be billed to {{ custom_organization_name }} at actuals.
  11. This offer is valid for 5 days.
  12. Contract duration is 24 months.
  13. Prices do not include VAT or any taxes imposed in the future.
